Browse the source code of netbsd/external/lgpl3/gmp/dist/mpq/inv.c

1/* mpq_inv(dest,src) -- invert a rational number, i.e. set DEST to SRC
2 with the numerator and denominator swapped.
3
4Copyright 1991, 1994, 1995, 2000, 2001, 2012 Free Software Foundation, Inc.
5
6This file is part of the GNU MP Library.
7
8The GNU MP Library is free software; you can redistribute it and/or modify
9it under the terms of either:
10
11 * the GNU Lesser General Public License as published by the Free
12 Software Foundation; either version 3 of the License, or (at your
13 option) any later version.
14
15or
16
17 * the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software
18 Foundation; either version 2 of the License, or (at your option) any
19 later version.
20
21or both in parallel, as here.
22
23The GNU MP Library is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but
24WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY
25or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License
26for more details.
27
28You should have received copies of the GNU General Public License and the
29GNU Lesser General Public License along with the GNU MP Library. If not,
30see https://www.gnu.org/licenses/. */
31
32#include "gmp.h"
33#include "gmp-impl.h"
34
35void
36mpq_inv (mpq_ptr dest, mpq_srcptr src)
37{
38 mp_size_t num_size = SIZ(NUM(src));
39 mp_size_t den_size = SIZ(DEN(src));
40
41 if (num_size < 0)
42 {
43 num_size = -num_size;
44 den_size = -den_size;
45 }
46 else if (UNLIKELY (num_size == 0))
47 DIVIDE_BY_ZERO;
48
49 SIZ(DEN(dest)) = num_size;
50 SIZ(NUM(dest)) = den_size;
51
52 /* If dest == src we may just swap the numerator and denominator;
53 we ensured that the new denominator is positive. */
54
55 if (dest == src)
56 {
57 MP_PTR_SWAP (PTR(NUM(dest)), PTR(DEN(dest)));
58 MP_SIZE_T_SWAP (ALLOC(NUM(dest)), ALLOC(DEN(dest)));
59 }
60 else
61 {
62 mp_ptr dp;
63
64 den_size = ABS (den_size);
65 dp = MPZ_NEWALLOC (NUM(dest), den_size);
66 MPN_COPY (dp, PTR(DEN(src)), den_size);
67
68 dp = MPZ_NEWALLOC (DEN(dest), num_size);
69 MPN_COPY (dp, PTR(NUM(src)), num_size);
70 }
71}
72
